meta.name: description
meta.content: Glendora Unified School District is located in Glendora, CA. The Glendora Unified School District equips our students with knowledge, skills, and character to succeed in college, career, and life in an ever-changing global society.

img.alt: Goddard and Moka Higashi Sister School Exchange

h3.a: GRAB-N-GO MEALS TO GLENDORA UNIFIED STUDENTS

div.div: STARTING ON MONDYAY, MARCH 16 th , THE GLENDORA UNIFIED NUTRITION SERVICES DEPARTMENT WILL BE OFFERING GRAB-N-GO MEALS TO GLENDORA UNIFIED STUDENTS AT NO COST DUE TO SCHOOL CLOSURES.

img.alt: 5th grade students voting in mock election.

h3.a: 5th Graders Vote in Arsalyn sponsored 'Mock Election'

div.div: All GUSD 5th graders had a chance to vote today in a mock election sponsored by the Arsalyn Program.
The April 27, 2020 Board of Education meeting is CANCELLED.

span.span: Students have taken at least 1 AP Exam
